metadata.title: Learning Assistant - Spaced Repetition and Active Recall
metadata.description: Use spaced repetition and active recall to improve memory

introduction: Learning Assistant helps you master knowledge through spaced repetition and active recall.

features.1: Add and manage knowledge points with questions and detailed answers.
features.2: Automatic review scheduling: 1 day, 7 days, 16 days, and 35 days later.
features.3: Practice active recall by writing what you remember before seeing the answer.
features.4: Track your progress and review only what's due today.

apiKeys.title: API Key Management
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for authentication
apiKeys.createDescription: Set a name for your API key to identify it
apiKeys.warning: Please save this API key securely. You will not be able to view the full key again.
apiKeys.deleteDescription: After deleting this API key, all requests using this key will fail. This action cannot be undone.
apiKeys.noKeysDescription: Create an API key to start using API features

chatSubtitle: Intelligently answer questions based on your knowledge base
chatDescription: Ask me anything! I'll search your knowledge base and provide helpful answers.
chatPlaceholder: Type your question... (Shift+Enter for new line)
chatExample1: Explain the principle of active recall
chatExample2: How can I better use spaced repetition?
chatExample3: How should I create a study plan?
fillKnowledgePointDetails: Fill in the question and detailed answer for your knowledge point
questionHint: Try to use a clear and concise question that is easy to recall
answerHint: Provide as detailed an explanation as possible to help understand and remember this knowledge point
answerHintMarkdown: Supports Markdown syntax: headings, lists, code blocks, tables, links, etc.
answerPlaceholderMarkdown:
Enter detailed explanation using Markdown...

Examples:
# Heading
- List item
**Bold text**
`code`
```language
code block
```
reviewPlanEnabledHint: This knowledge point will be scheduled for review: 1, 7, 16, and 35 days later
reviewPlanDisabledHint: This knowledge point will not be included in the review schedule

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Learn Assistant (hereinafter referred to as "this application") values your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. By using this application, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.intro: To provide better services, we may collect the following information:
section2.item1: Account Information: including your email address, username, and other registration information
section2.item2: Learning Data: knowledge points you create, review records, active recall content, and other learning-related data
section2.item3: Usage Data: including how you use this application, access times, device information, etc.
section2.item4: Technical Information: including IP address, browser type, operating system, etc.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
section3.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
section3.item1: Provide and maintain core features of this application, including knowledge point management, review scheduling, etc.
section3.item2: Improve and optimize user experience, analyze usage patterns to enhance service quality
section3.item3: Send important notifications, such as service updates, security reminders, etc.
section3.item4: Ensure service security, prevent fraud, abuse, and unauthorized access

section4.title: 4. Information Storage and Security
section4.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored on secure servers and transmitted and stored using encryption technology. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
section5.content: This application uses Google OAuth for authentication. When you sign in with Google, we obtain your basic account information (such as email address). We do not access or store your Google account password. We use Supabase as our backend service provider, and your data will be processed according to Supabase's privacy policy.

section6.title: 6. Data Access and Control
section6.content: You can access, modify, or delete your personal information at any time. You can manage your account and data through the settings function within the application. If you wish to delete your account, please contact us.

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section7.content: This application may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience. These technologies help us remember your preferences and provide personalized services. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us through the in-app feedback function or send an email to yxg2024@gmail.com.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: Welcome to Learn Assistant (hereinafter referred to as "this service"). By accessing or using this service, you agree to comply with these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this service.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.intro: Learn Assistant is a learning application based on spaced repetition and active recall, providing the following features:
section2.item1: Knowledge Point Management: create, edit, and delete learning knowledge points
section2.item2: Intelligent Review Scheduling: automatically schedule review times based on scientific algorithms
section2.item3: Active Recall Practice: deepen memory through active recall
section2.item4: Progress Tracking: view learning progress and review status in real-time

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content: Using this service requires creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security and accuracy of your account information. You may not share your account with others or use your account for any illegal purposes. If you discover unauthorized use of your account, please notify us immediately.

section4.title: 4. User Conduct
section4.content: You agree not to use this service for any illegal activities, not to interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the service, and not to attempt unauthorized access to systems or data. Violation of these terms may result in account suspension or termination.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content of this service, including but not limited to software, design, text, graphics, logos, etc., is protected by intellectual property laws. Without authorization, you may not copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works.

section6.title: 6. Service Availability
section6.content: We strive to ensure continuous service availability but do not guarantee that the service will not be interrupted. We may suspend the service for maintenance, upgrades, or other reasons and will make every effort to notify users in advance.

section7.title: 7. Disclaimer
section7.content: This service is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the service. You assume all risks associated with using this service.

section8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
section8.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this service.

section9.title: 9. Modification of Terms
section9.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Modified terms will be published on this page. Continued use of this service indicates your acceptance of the modified terms. If you do not agree to the modifications, please stop using this service.
